results.description: Flamengo reach their first Copa Libertadores final in 35 years after thrashing fellow Brazilian side Gremio 5-0 in their semi-final second leg.
results.shortTitle: Flamengo beat Gremio to reach final
results.title: Copa Libertadores: Flamengo beat Gremio and face River Plate in final

thumbnail.altText: Flamengo players celebrate at the final whistle after beating Gremio to reach the Copa Libertadores final

results.description: Police arrest 16 Flamengo fans for "threats to kill police" before the Copa Libertadores semi-final second leg against Gremio in Brazil.
results.title: Copa Libertadores: Flamengo fans arrested before Gremio semi-final

results.description: Brazil captain Dani Alves completes a free transfer to boyhood club Sao Paulo, signing a deal until December 2022.
results.shortTitle: Alves joins boyhood club Sao Paulo
results.title: Dani Alves: Sao Paulo sign former PSG, Juventus and Barcelona defender

results.description: Ronaldinho's son Joao Mendes signs training contract with Brazilian club Cruzeiro.
results.title: Ronaldinho's son Joao Mendes signs with Brazilian club Cruzeiro

results.description: Borussia Dortmund midfielder Shinji Kagawa joins Turkish side Besiktas on loan for the rest of the season.
results.title: European transfers round-up: Shinji Kagawa joins Besiktas

results.description: Douglas Braga looked set to have a promising career as a footballer in Brazil - so why did he not?
results.title: The Brazilian footballer who never was

thumbnail.altText: Douglas Braga poses for the camera at a LGBT football tournament

results.description: The Copa Libertadores game between Santos of Brazil and Independiente of Argentina is abandoned after police clashed with an angry home crowd.
results.shortTitle: Angry Santos fans force game abandonment
results.title: Copa Libertadores game abandoned after Santos fans protest against 3-0 penalty imposed just before match

results.description: Real Madrid present Brazil's 18-year-old Vinicius Junior at the Bernabeu Stadium after completing his £38.7m signing.
results.title: Real Madrid: Brazilian teenager Vinicius Junior arrives in £38.7m deal

thumbnail.altText: Vinicius Junior holds his new Real Madrid jersey as he poses with club president Florentino Perez

results.description: The two men have been on trial in the US as part of a major inquiry into corruption at Fifa.
results.shortTitle: S American football bosses convicted in US
results.title: Fifa corruption: South America football bosses convicted

thumbnail.altText: Jose Maria Marin and Juan Ángel Napout in a collage image from photographs outside court on 21 December

results.description: Watford confirm the signing of Brazil Under-20 international Richarlison after he is granted a work permit.
results.title: Richarlison: Watford sign Brazil Under-20 forward on five-year deal
